text: Pehle online store pe click karein. Yahan aapko bohat sari themes milengi. Ek aisi theme choose karein jo aapke brand se match kare aur user friendly ho.
Teen se zyada colors use karne se bachne ki koshish karein.  Ek consistent color scheme use karein jo aapke brand ki personality ko reflect kare aur products ko highlight kare.
Professional aur clear product images use karein.  Images mein lighting aur background pe dhyan dein.  Zoom karne ka option zarur rakhne ki koshish karein.
Har page pe clear call to action buttons use karein.  'Shop Now,' 'Learn More,' ya 'Contact Us' jaise buttons use karein.  In buttons ko highlight karein taake woh easily visible hon.
